name: london_boroughs_grid
desc: Grid layout for the boroughs of London. Note that the column \code{code_ons} contains the \href{http://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/datasets/464be6191a434a91a5fa2f52c7433333_0?uiTab=table}{codes} used by UK Office for National Statistics.

name: nhs_scot_grid
desc: Grid layout for a grid of NHS Scotland Health Boards. Note that the column \code{code} contains the \href{http://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/datasets/61dca36aa33e4aee99bbfa784fa9eb25_0?uiTab=table}{codes} used by UK Office for National Statistics.

name: india_grid1
desc: Grid layout for India states (not including union territories).

name: india_grid2
desc: Grid layout for India states (not including union territories).

name: argentina_grid1
desc: Grid for the 23 provinces of Argentina. It includes the Malvinas/Falkland Islands and the Antarctic Territories (these are disputed, but they are included since many researchers might use data from these locations).

name: br_grid1
desc: Grid for the 27 states of Brazil.

name: sea_grid1
desc: Grid for South East Asian countries.

name: mys_grid1
desc: Grid for Malaysian states and territories.

name: fr_regions_grid1
desc: Land and overseas regions of France. Codes are INSEE codes.

desc: Grid for the German states ('LÃ¤nder')
